title: AmbientCast
description: AmbientCast Web Radio Suite Docker installation.

env.name: AMBIENTCAST_HTTP_PORT
env.label: HTTP Port
env.description: The port that will receive non-secure HTTP traffic.

env.name: AMBIENTCAST_HTTPS_PORT
env.label: HTTPS Port
env.description: The port that will receive secure HTTPS traffic.

env.name: LETSENCRYPT_HOST
env.label: LetsEncrypt Host
env.description: The optional domain name to use if wanting to auto-register with LetsEncrypt.

env.name: LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL
env.label: LetsEncrypt E-mail Address
env.description: The optional e-mail address to receive updates regarding LetsEncrypt certificates.

env.name: AMBIENTCAST_VERSION
env.label: AmbientCast Release Channel
env.description: Which release channel of AmbientCast to update to.

note: AmbientCast is the free and open-source software suite that makes web radio easy. This is the standard Docker installation for AmbientCast, including all necessary components.
